sub_title: Seeking a New career challenge. Domino's Pizza: International Marketing Specialist. MBA - University of Westminster
summary:
I am a highly self-motivated person with exceptional communication and interpersonal skills and a Masters degree in Business Administration from the University of Westminster, London. 

An experienced Manager from working in the highly dynamic quick service restaurant category as an International Marketing Specialist and National Marketing Manager at DOMINOS PIZZA International based in the Netherlands and SUBWAY UK & Ireland and with solid experience in Business Development and Marketing in the Financial Services industry as a Business Development and Marketing Specialist at HSBC Bank Egypt. 

I have outstanding relationship management skills with proven ability to quickly analyse situations and determine a solution. My experience and skills set have been developed from Managing, partnering, fostering and building strong relationship with Franchisees, business partners, business owners and development agents to grow profitable sales across all companies and sectors. I have solid experience and knowledge of introducing new products and solutions to markets and finally implementing effective National Marketing campaigns.

An enthusiastic and fast-learner with sound level of computer knowledge, I can quickly grasp and manage new work demands, balancing commitments to deliver to agreed deadlines. I believe that my characteristics and qualities would prove beneficial and help me grow my career through achieving company goals.

profile_positions.description:
Ensure regional and market-specific brand sales goals are achieved by partnering effectively with franchisees to design and deliver effective insight-driven marketing strategies.  Play a lead role in structuring, executing and synthesizing strategic and marketing insights to drive the business.  Support Franchise Marketing consulting team as primary liaison and information source for best practices developed across the regions.

•	Utilize common analytic tools to identify insights and best practices from regional and market sales performance such as pricing trends, volume trends, customer acquisition, conversion, etc.
•	Monitor & evaluate promotional activity; identify & disseminate best practices across markets
•	Improve franchisee performance via effective planning and execution of marketing programs
•	Communicate new marketing tools & programs and changes to existing programs
•	Act as primary liaison and information source for best practices developed across the regions
•	Collect and manage regional menu, innovation, pricing and promotions facts
•	Play a lead role in planning and executing regional events and communications
•	Work directly with Regional Vice President to develop data-driven answers to key strategic business questions and on the development of both the annual and long-range strategic plans
•	Work directly with Manager of International Strategy & Insights to support regional development of global insights priorities such as market-sizing and relative market share
profile_positions.title: International Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for partnering with the franchisee community, advertising agencies and development agents to grow profitable sales for stores across the UK & Ireland, I lead marketing efforts and build relationships with stakeholders to build the brand equity by translating consumer insights into tangible programs that drive results.

●	Develop long and short term marketing plans with key stakeholders and manage execution
●	Managed and Implemented Marketing campaigns that assisted the company to achieve 10% growth in sales and customer count YOY
●	Lead and evaluate key marketing programs providing in-depth analysis using available reporting tools with future recommendations to enhance business performance
●	Manage budget forecasts and spending to maximize efficiency
●	Foster and build strong relationships with internal and external key stakeholders across all levels to grow the business and increase profitable sales. 
●	Managed and executed digital marketing campaigns and managed National website content
●	Managed, lead and grew Social Media Channels of SUBWAY resulting in +280% growth 2012 
●	Provide strategic brand direction and lead efforts with creative and media agencies
●	Prepare and present performance analysis & reports to board of directors and regional boards
●	Company representative in 4 of 9 regions, overlooking performance and ensure area performance, achieve results, identify weaknesses, brand guardian and liaise with all marketing related activity
profile_positions.title: National Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing and acquiring partnerships with external parties resulting in growth and expansion of the business.I also executed marketing plans, leading the work with creative agencies.
Additionally, my role involved developing, improving and launching bank products that offered customers enhanced and privileged servicesand leading the implementation of their marketing campaigns.

●	Select and recruit business partners to help grow business and provide a competitive edge
●	Provide analysis and business cases to senior management for new programs to drive sales
●	Manage relationship with key business partners VISA and MASTERCARD
●	Develop, implement & execute co-branded National campaigns with VISA & MASTERCARD
●	Analyse & optimize performance of co-branded VISA and MASTERCARD campaigns
●	Developed and Launched to market HSBC Egypt’s first VISA DEBIT CARD 
●	Developed, Launched and managed HSBC’s Credit Card loyalty program, HSBC SELECT
●	Use consumer insight to develop and execute marketing plans
●	Lead implementation of Marketing plans and campaigns, managing the agency relationship
●	Develop and enhance bank product specifications and features to provide a competitive edge
●	Executed and managed the launch of the first debit card and HSBC Advance service in Egypt
●	Monitor annual budgets to ensure spend efficiency
●	Evaluate performance of programs and launches to provide future recommendations
profile_positions.title: Business Development and Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for providing investment guidance and provide potential investors with investment opportunities in foreign funds managed by HSBC Securities worldwide. 

The role involved achieving investment targets in foreign currency from all potential investors and more importantly manage the relationship with existing investors, following up on the performance of the funds and customer’s investments providing performance analysis and reports

•	Manage & build relationship with current and potential investors in the foreign funds available
•	Achieved 100% of foreign funds sales target assigned 
•	Present detailed performance updates, analysis and results to clients and senior management
•	Manage and grow client portfolios including budget management
•	Maintain and grow strong relationships with clients to optimize utilization of available facilities
•	Provide upper management and clients with monthly performance analysis and reports
•	Liaise with line managers and cross-departmental members to create portfolio analysis and presentations for Senior management and clients
profile_positions.title: Investment Associate - Financial Planning Services
